definition: Lesser Cold, 23rd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-19th January

sentences.english: Today is Xiaohan, the temperature dropped, especially the cold.
sentences.chinese: 今天是小寒，氣溫又下降了，顯得格外的冷。

sentences.english: My name is Zhao Xiaohan. I'm seven.
According gto tradition, the Cantonese eat glutinous rice in the morning during Minor Cold.
sentences.chinese: 按照傳統，廣東人在小寒期間的早上要喫糯米飯。

sentences.english: It is a folk festival, eat dumplings slight.
sentences.chinese: 有一句民謠叫“大寒小寒，喫餃子過年。”

sentences.english: According to tradition, the Cantonese eat glutinous rice in the morning during Minor Cold.
sentences.chinese: 按照傳統，廣東人在小寒期間的早上要喫糯米飯。

sentences.english: FY:Xiaohan, do I hurt you often?
sentences.chinese: 小寒，我常常使你痛苦嗎？

sentences.english: It is also very cold in the Lesser Cold of the lunar calendar, keep yourself warm.
sentences.chinese: 小寒的時候天也很冷，所以你一定要注意保暖。

definition: Great Cold, 24th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 20th January-3rd February
Lidong or Start of Winter, 19th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st November
Hanlu or Cold Dew, 17th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd October
Jingzhe or Insects Wake, 3rd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-20th March
Winter Solstice, 22nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 22nd December-5th January
nine periods of nine days each after winter solstice, the coldest time of the year
Xiaoshu or Lesser Heat, 11th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd July
Shuangjiang or Frost Descends, 18th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd October-6th November
Bailu or White Dew, 15th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd September
Liqiu or Start of Autumn, 13th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd August
Dashu or Great Heat, 12th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd July-6th August
nine periods of nine days each after winter solstice, the coldest time of the year
